thread.title: Watch Nick Saban, Alabama football players thank fans for support at Tide homecoming pep rally
thread.title_full: Watch Nick Saban, Alabama football players thank fans for support at Tide homecoming pep rally

author: Ben Flanagan | bflanagan@al.com
title: Watch Nick Saban, Alabama football players thank fans for support at Tide homecoming pep rally
text:
comments Watch Nick Saban, Alabama football players thank fans for support at Tide homecoming pep rally Watch Nick Saban and Alabama Players at the 2015 Homecoming Pep Rally Alabama football head coach Nick Saban and several Crimson Tide players address fans at the annual homecoming pep rally on the Quad in Tuscaloosa on Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. (Ben Flanagan/AL.com) Comments 
TUSCALOOSA, Alabama -- Plenty of things about University of Alabama homecoming festivities help to draw a huge crowd annually on the Quad, but Nick Saban and a handful of his Crimson Tide football players sure don't hurt. 
Fans gathered on campus Friday night for the annual homecoming pep rally and bonfire, which saw appearances from the head coach, who thanked fans for the support they've shown so far and let some of his players introduce themselves and give a nice "Roll Tide!" the the crowd. 
Seniors Reggie Ragland and Ryan Kelly finished the group, each of them saying an extra thanks to the fans for making the last four years of their lives and careers in Tuscaloosa that much more special. 
Watch video of Saban and the players above.
